description: A jack-of-all-trades for demanding mountaineering adventures from backcountry skiing to ice climbing. The Eisfeld Guide hybrid softshell pants are made with a hybrid blend of technical materials for excellent breathability, flexibility and protection from the elements. Gore-Tex Infinium™ material and partially taped seams protect you fully from wind and are extra water repellant around the exposed areas, such as the seat, knees and lower legs. The other parts are made of highly breathable and durable softshell double weave fabric.The Eisfeld Guide boasts plenty of extra features as well. Rugged crampon protection, removeable and adjustable gaiters, lots of convenient pockets and well-designed details make the Eisfeld Guide a high-quality, versatile pair of softshell pants for alpine expeditions.
name: Mammut Eisfeld Guide SO Pants, Reg - Mens
